turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I need help ordering a drink from Starbucks. Can you help me out, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing. Which starbucks did you want to pickup from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ANd what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order Grande Caffè Mocha, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what milk did you want in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you guys use 2% milk, please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you use whipped cream with a dash of cinnamon on top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I have a grande cafe mocha with 2%, whipped cream, and a dash of cinnamon on top, from the starbucks on 4th Street, Colorado SPrings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, you're all set, the order will be ready for pickup in 15 minutes and you'll get your reciept via mobile.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much for your help, I appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: of course, any time. have a good one.
